jobDescription: ClipperData is an innovative data company founded in 2013 that provides transparency to the energy sector with granular, real-time information on crude and petroleum product waterborne shipments, and proprietary monitors, domestically and globally. Our clients include diverse market participants across the energy, logistics, and financial sectors. We are headquartered in New York City, with satellite offices in North Carolina, Kentucky and Texas.  The quantitative team is currently looking for interns to assist with some general data cleaning works for some of our company's proprietary products. The intern(s) would be responsible for coming into the office in Flatiron most weekdays.  Im looking for someones who have good spreadsheet skills, and be clever in a general way. have close attention to detail, responsibility, and an interest in learning about markets. SQL knowledge is very helpful.Job Types: Full-time, Part-time  Salary: $13.00 /hour Education:
